opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Chappell v. Cockrell, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division

opinion:
537 U.S. 1041

CHAPPELL
v.
COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.

No. 02-7527 (02A413).

Supreme Court of United States.

November 20, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 5th Cir. Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 54 Fed. Appx. 591.
